name: Patrick Ewing
description: 7'0" center, Georgetown legend, #1 overall pick. King of New York who never won a championship. Dominated the 90s but always fell to Jordan's Bulls. Iconic sweaty warrior, finger roll specialist, intimidating presence. So close, so many times.

fadeaway-baseline.name: Baseline Fadeaway
fadeaway-baseline.description: Signature mid-range jumper from the baseline
fadeaway-baseline.prompt: releasing fadeaway jumper from baseline - body leaning back, arm extended with soft touch, the shot that made him an All-Star eleven times, warrior's intensity

finger-roll.name: Finger Roll
finger-roll.description: Delicate finger roll at the rim - soft touch for a big man
finger-roll.prompt: extending arm for soft finger roll at rim - delicate touch despite size, ball rolling off fingertips, the finesse that surprised opponents

intimidation-stare.name: Georgetown Intimidation
intimidation-stare.prompt: standing with intense intimidating stare - sweat glistening, eyes burning with intensity, the Georgetown intimidation that terrorized opponents, don't come in the paint

blocked-layup.name: 1994 Finals Block
blocked-layup.description: The blocked layup that cost the championship
blocked-layup.prompt: reacting to blocked shot in crucial moment - face showing shock as championship slips away, hand still extended from attempt, the moment that defined a career of almosts

sweat-warrior.name: Sweating Warrior
sweat-warrior.description: The iconic image - drenched in sweat, still fighting
sweat-warrior.prompt: standing drenched in sweat mid-game - jersey soaked, sweat dripping, but eyes still fierce, the warrior who gave everything every night even without championship reward

watching-jordan.name: Watching Jordan Celebrate
watching-jordan.description: The recurring nightmare - watching MJ win again
watching-jordan.prompt: standing defeated watching opponent celebrate - shoulders slumped, watching the celebration he never got to have, the king of New York who was never king of the NBA
